attributes.action: Posthumously award Bill Shankley a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bill Shankley, a true legend within the football world. Overlooked for his amazing achievements within the sport. Others within this genre have done far lees to recieve a Kighthood, it is time that Bill Shankley recieved what he rightfully deserves.

rejection.details: Sorry but we no longer deal with requests for posthumous awards.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
